E-Commerce Support

At HEP Heroes we know that running an online store requires a lot of focus: site development, SEO, SEA, product purchasing and much more. Our management team has supported over 200+ merchants in the implementation of their e-commerce environment. We believe that we can relief you with some of the burden of your customer care operations: create happy customers, reduce operational costs and increase your revenue.

We supported over 200+ online merchants: we know how to create happy customers, reduce operational costs and increase average order value

Our services will allow you to grow revenue, without hiring more staff. Or if needed we just support you during your busy season.

Our e-commerce customer care services can be split into several key-areas:

 

Pre-Sales Support

Our Heroes will support your online visitors via chat, email or phone. Trained on your products and processes we will answer visitor inquiries, assist them in the check-out process and provide them with the care which will turn them from a visitor into a paying customer. Oh yeah..along the way we will try to increase average order value by selling extended warranties, higher margin products or useful accessories.

Our pre-sales support services are available to you in a dedicated environment, but we are certainly willing to discuss overflow or mixed-team solutions. Contact us to discuss your wishes and we will work towards a solutions where both your customers and you will benefit from.

 

After Sales Support

With increasing online sales, so will the number of inquiries grow of customers. Maybe they have a question about a product they purchased, or it got damaged during transportation. At start these customers maybe be disappointed in your products or service…our goal is to exceed their expectations with Heroic customer care and turn them into satisfied customers.

Good after sales support will also ensure that the number of (unnecessary) product returns is reduced to a minimum, allowing you to reduce your operating and logistics costs.

 

Upsell Services

We are pretty sure you are using all the tools available in your store to increase average order value directly on your e-commerce platform: Free shipping above [x] $, upsell products on the checkout page and possibly you are trying to sell extended warranties.

At JEP Heroes we will engage in conversations with your customers and sell them those added products and services which add value to them.

 

Sales Order Follow-Up

We are pretty sure 95% of online merchants do not use the full potential of a good sales order follow-up. Asking for product reviews, on a timely matter contact the customer again with a proper segmented promotion seem obvious actions to take…but they take time, focus and organisation. That’s where our Heroes and automated workflows come into play.

Do you want to learn more about our e-commerce support services? Simply drop us a message and we will get back to you within one working day.
